author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1709946840}
review:
This is a simplistic low poly 3D squad based RTS game where you control a small unit of soldiers and fight enemies. 

The game crashes on launch and is unplayable, so also impossible to recommend.  It's not ethical for developers to keep asking for people to buy a game that doesn't work.  Thumbs down.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133845992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 183, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1615110357}
review:
One of the best Early Access RTS games I have ever seen.
OK its clear it's a long way to final version,
but you do see here already great design and nice ideas.

The AI is smart and is reliable.
The concept of take over buildings and street wars is convincing.

The gain of base remembers me of Gangland,
but the combat and armies size of Warhammer Dawn of War.

It looks promising. 
Guys you are awesome and keep the good work.
